resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

Setup: Connect the Android device to the bluetooth haptic gloves. Wear both haptic gloves and open the Insight Android application. The gloves haptics will all vibrate 10 times to communicate successful start-up.

Usage: Form a screen with both hands pointing down and facing towards the stomach. Objects within a distance in front of the camera trigger vibrations varying in strenght. Both pinky fingers communicate the directions to take if the commuting features of the Insight app are in use. Braille communication is done on the right most fingers of the right hand.
Legend: S for step. W for water. P for person.
